meanings.definition: A genre of electronic dance music characterized by syncopated rhythms and heavy bass.
meanings.sent1: The club was alive with the energetic dubsteps playing in the background.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to dubsteps while I work out at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The party really got going once the dubsteps started playing.
meanings.sent4: The dubsteps flowed through the room like a powerful river of sound.
meanings.sent5: The dubsteps thumped in my chest, making me want to dance.

meanings.definition: To remix a song by adding a heavy bassline and syncopated rhythms.
meanings.sent1: She decided to dubsteps her favorite song to give it a fresh twist.
meanings.sent2: The DJ loves to dubsteps popular tracks to make them more danceable.
meanings.sent3: I dubstepsed my alarm tone to make waking up more exciting.
meanings.sent4: His remix dubstepsed the original song into a whole new experience.
meanings.sent5: The artist plans to dubsteps his entire album for a special release.
